reviewText:
I Enjoyed these two Ruth Rendell  mysteries and was glad to see them on dvd. The adaption for
Television was very good and the acting was great. Ruth Rendell is one of the Best.
The two best Inspector Wexford mysteries in one package; Terrific stories by Ruth Rendell to begin with coupled with an equally good movie script and top notch acting.

I really enjoyed both of these movies.  The plot was excellent.  I like trying to guess who did it and these two movies were excellent mysteries.  I wish there were more movies by Ruth Rendell.  I am sort of hooked (smile).
very good movie kept me on the edge of my seat through out the movie,wife felt the same way.
the series seemed to drag in the beginning and if your patience it comes clear it was ok

This is part of the Ruth Rendell Inspector Wexford series and as with all Inspector Wexford stories this held me in suspense all through the program.  Acting is brilliant, George Baker is marvelous as Wexford as usual.  The English scenery is good and Ruth Rendell throws in plenty of red herrings to keep the viewer on the edge of the seat.
